## Source: ossf-package-analysis (24ccbe0b13f81d2fe8d285bab144167d33f7b4e167833ebf615411db6d318eb6)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified '@ing-caf/cdn-proxy-plugin' @ 200.0.2 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
